articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Referees' body PGMOL terminates the employment of Premier League official David Coote with immediate effect following a "thorough investigation".
articles.title: David Coote: Premier League referee sacked with immediate effect by PGMOL

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Elianne Andam was stabbed in the neck outside a Croydon shopping centre while supporting a friend.
articles.title: Elianne Andam stabbing: Hassan Sentamu's murder trial begins

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The King also spoke of feeling "slightly anxious" about wearing the heavy St Edward's Crown at his own coronation.
articles.title: King Charles: Queen Elizabeth II wore crown at bath time

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Police are investigating Edinburgh councillor Cammy Day following an allegation of inappropriate behaviour.
articles.title: Cammy Day: Edinburgh council leader quits over alleged messages

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The IDF also released photos of its personnel who crossed from the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights into the buffer zone where UN peacekeepers are based.
articles.title: Israel says it struck suspected Syria chemical weapon sites

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Jay-Z has dismissed the action as a "blackmail attempt", while Diddy has denied the claims against him.
articles.title: Lawsuit alleges Jay-Z and Diddy raped 13-year-old girl

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Travel impacts also continue after the storm caused significant disruption over the weekend.
articles.title: Flood warnings as thousands without power after Storm Darragh

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo are among the contenders as Hollywood's award season kicks off.
articles.title: Golden Globes 2025: Wicked's Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande scoop nominations

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Pat McFadden says any decision should be "swift" after the group led the overthrow of al-Assad rule.
articles.title: UK could remove Syrian rebel group from terror list

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Labour has ruled out rejoining the European Union but wants to "break down barriers to trade".
articles.title: Rachel Reeves says closer UK and EU ties will boost economic growth
